headline: 3 Value Stocks We Find Risky
summary: Value investing has created more billionaires than any other strategy, like Warren Buffett, who built his fortune by purchasing wonderful businesses at reasonable prices. But these hidden gems are few and far between - many stocks that appear cheap often stay that way because they face structural issues.

headline: Franklin Resources (BEN): Evaluating Valuation After Recent Loss of Share Price Momentum
summary: Franklin Resources (BEN) stock has seen a steady climb this year, but over the past three months shares are down about 12%. Investors are sizing up recent results as they weigh the company’s long-term potential. See our latest analysis for Franklin Resources. After a solid run earlier this year, momentum in Franklin Resources shares has faded recently. The 12.1% drop in the last three months followed a year-to-date share price gain of over 10%. While the recent dip reflects shifting risk...
